properties.question: What is the recommended first-line treatment for external haemorrhoidal thrombosis?
properties.option_a: Immediate surgical intervention to remove the thrombosed hemorrhoid
properties.option_b: Application of a warm sitz bath to reduce inflammation and promote drainage
properties.option_d: Use of topical corticosteroids to reduce localized swelling
